about_the_game:
Experience the thrilling and immersive world of Escape from Voyna, a high-octane, gripping single-player shooter. Set during the tumultuous era of the Cold War, this action-packed game unfolds on Russian soil. Following numerous nuclear tests, the country lies in ruins, consumed by an apocalyptic catastrophe. As a covert secret agent, your mission is to navigate the treacherous terrain of an isolated island, fighting to escape the clutches of enemy soldiers and elude capture. Prepare for an intense, realistic, and adrenaline-pumping adventure that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

Survive in this unique world and experience a mysterious world!




In the midst of the Cold War, global superpowers vie for supremacy, relentlessly pursuing the development of ever more powerful nuclear weapons. These deadly creations are tested on remote islands, far from prying eyes. Unfortunately, fate intervenes, and you find yourself stranded on one of these isolated islands. As an undercover American secret agent, your mission is to evade capture by the formidable Russian Special Forces of the RSWS. Your survival and the balance of power hang in the balance as you navigate this treacherous landscape.



In the midst of the Cold War, global superpowers vie for supremacy, relentlessly pursuing the development of ever more powerful nuclear weapons. These deadly creations are tested on remote islands, far from prying eyes. Unfortunately, fate intervenes, and you find yourself stranded on one of these isolated islands. As an undercover American secret agent, your mission is to evade capture by the formidable Russian Special Forces of the RSWS. Your survival and the balance of power hang in the balance as you navigate this treacherous landscape.

You need to find food or medical supplies to heal yourself.



Immerse yourself in a vast arsenal of meticulously modeled weapons within the game. Experience the realistic recoil that adds an extra layer of challenge, emphasizing the importance of aiming precisely before taking your shots. Keep in mind that ammunition is limited, adding a strategic element to your gameplay. Make every shot count and manage your resources wisely to overcome the hurdles you face.



Prepare for formidable adversaries that will keep you on your toes. The advanced AI is keenly aware of your every move, detecting even the faintest sound of your footsteps and shots. They will relentlessly hunt you down with precision accuracy. Beware, as the AI is capable of coordinating with each other as a cohesive team, utilizing cover effectively. To outsmart them, it's advisable to adopt stealth tactics, familiarize yourself with their patrol routes, and potentially evade certain enemies altogether. Remember, time is of the essence, and the AI seldom misses its mark. In many instances, escape or avoidance may prove to be the wiser course of action.

Atmospheric graphics based on Unity DX11


With Unity Engine and DirextX 11 we created a beautiful, living world you just want to immerse in. Enjoy the trees, grasses and stunning light effects. Get the maximum out of your PC and experience AAA worlds.

Realistic 7.1 surround sound

Experience realistic gun sounds of AK and friends in 7.1 surround sound quality. Let the ambience of the surroundings enchant

content_descriptors.notes: Killing people can be a solution.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista ,7, 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 2GB, AMD Radeon 7850 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 compatible Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows Vista ,7, 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 4GB, AMD Radeon R9 290 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 compatible Sound Card

short_description: Escape from Voyna is an action packed realistic single player shooter set in the era of the Cold War on russian soil. After many nuclear tests the land is devastated and apocalypse spreading. You, a secret agent stranded on an island try to escape without getting caught by enemy soldiers.
